column4: thanks for the link.. i thinkn this about the wifi password.. but my problem is about the login password that network-manager requests in order to get the wifi password from the keyring

i'm using fluxbox and it turned everything is ok in unity (12.04). then i also figured out why it works in unity but not in fluxbox.. i have to start gnome-keyring-daemon with the ffollowing options: --login --damonize
